## DynamicControlGroupStyling interface

Describes the different stylings options available for [DynamicControlGroup](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicControlGroupStyling 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fxLayout?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroupstyling.fxlayout.md) | "row" \| "column" | <i>(Optional)</i> The flex layout type for the group. |
|  [fxLayoutAlign?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroupstyling.fxlayoutalign.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The flex alignments for the group. Check fxLayout |
|  [itemMargin?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroupstyling.itemmargin.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The margin applied to questions in the group. Use regular css margin syntax. |
|  [panelClass](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroupstyling.panelclass.md) | string | A custom class added to the anchor tag of the component |
